intros xs p ys net st' ps' d m t n pli plt es ci.
intros Hhandle Hbody HPnet Hreachable Hpackets Hforall.
assert (raft_net_invariant_init (raft_net_invariant_append_entries candidate_term_gt_log)).
  apply raft_net_invariant.
  assumption.
  assumption.
  assumption.
  assumption.
  assumption.
  assumption.
  assumption.
  assumption.
  assumption.
assert (candidate_term_gt_log net).
  apply candidate_term_gt_log_invariant.
  assumption.
  assumption.
assert (no_entries_past_current_term net).
  apply no_entries_past_current_term_host.
  apply candidate_term_gt_log.
  assumption.
assert (forall h : name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d h).
  apply Hforall.
assert (In p (nwPackets net)).
  apply Hpackets.
assert (pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci).
  apply Hbody.
assert (handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m)).
  apply Hhandle.
clear Hhandle Hbody HPnet Hreachable Hpackets Hforall.
induction xs.
- simpl in *.
  intros.
  apply raft_net_invariant_append_entries.
  assumption.
  assumption.
  assumption.
  assumption.
  assumption.
  assumption.
  assumption.
  assumption.
- simpl in *.
  intros.
  apply raft_net_invariant_append_entries.
  assumption.
  assumption.
  assumption.
  assumption.
  assumption.
  assumption.
  assumption.
  assumption.
Qed.
